item.description:
ScaleArc iDB is a MySQL traffic management software engine that inserts transparently between applications and MySQL databases. iDB provides instant visibility and analysis into
database problems with deep, real-time SQL analytics. iDB enables instant scalability (both vertical and horizontal scalability) and higher availability for MySQL databases with features like read/write split, replication-aware load balancing and sharding capabilities. Up to 60X faster query performance is achieved with transparent query caching, and security
is strengthened with SQL filtering/firewall capabilities. iDB requires *no* modifications to applications or databases to setup and deploy. iDB is available as software on any x86-64 server, as a virtual appliance on any x86 compatible hypervisor, or as a turn-key appliance. iDB is cloud-ready and available via service providers such as the Amazon AWS/EC2 Cloud, GoGrid, Joyent, Liquid Web Hosting and NephoScale.

Technical representatives from ScaleArc will be reviewing use cases and
presenting a live demo of ScaleArc iDB.
